TopicTitle: Can we have the 'Do not use Stock craft' option back

Articles.Content:
Unless I am mistaken there used to be a check box to 'switch off' the stock craft when starting a new game.  Can we have it back please ?   

I prefer to not edit the game file if I don't have to.

IIRC it's only there for Career games.  Needs to be for every game.  Or an actual option in the game preferences.  I got nothing against example craft but they really litter up my craft list in sandbox.
